alert.note: Alert for Northwestern Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 22 at 1:16PM PST until February 26 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE SATURDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches in valleys with 6 to 18+ inches possible in mountains. Winds could gust as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Northwestern Nye County. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 4 PM PST this afternoon. For the Winter Storm Watch, from Friday morning through late Saturday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
